arduino.arduinocom

Class ExecutionStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • arduino.arduinocom.ExecutionStatus
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arduino.ArduinoExecutionStatus

    public abstract class ExecutionStatus
extends Object
    An object used to monitor the status of the execution of a command on the Arduino.
    Author:
    Jacob Glueck
